website_summaries.verdict: Once you get it together and installed, this option looks like you paid a lot more for it than you did.
pros: Good price for an elegant fixture
Gives off a lot of light
cons: The instructions are pretty meager to non-existent, which adds time and difficulty to both the assembly and installation
Some buyers report problems with quality

customer_reviews.title: Very nice once installed!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fixture. It does take some installation but the glass pieces were easy to put together in about 5 mins. If you push the ring open by pressing along the diameter of the rings the free edge is easy to thread into the main suspension ring. I couldn't have installed the chandelier on the roof with out my husband's help but that doesn't mean much as my skills with tools are far from adequate. It did take him couple of hours to figure everything out since the instructions are about 5 sentences long. Once all done, it is breathtaking! Great piece for the price!
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is more beautiful in person. My room is about 14x12 feet maybe bigger but this lights up the whole room! I used LED chandelier lights. My husband was able to install where we had a ceiling fan so it was simple as following the instructions. If you do not have an existing electrical fixture then you will need an electrician. It was extremely easy to assemble and for the price it looks way more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Auberguste

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous for my walk in closet
customer_reviews.text: I bought his chandelier to go in my master bedroom walk in closet/vanity. It matches the pendant in the water closet and also the lights above the mirror in the bathroom. The instructions were very minimal but I had no trouble putting the light together using logo and common sense. The issue for me was trying to get the chandelier to sit straight. Since I was putting it in the closet vs over a table, the chain was too long and I had to cut most of it away. I had to finagle some stuff together so that it could attach to the ceiling box. I wish it came with a downrod for shorter ceilings.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel J. Branch

customer_reviews.title: Dazzling and Romantic
customer_reviews.text: I've been replacing all my light fixtures. So far I've chosen mostly simple and modern pieces, so I decided to have fun in the dining room. This is probably a bit too glam, but I love it! It is exactly as I expected. A little time consuming to assemble, but worth it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: There are no instructions! Must be handy and knowledgeable to put together and wire up!
customer_reviews.text: There are no instructions included with this light fixture. You will need to know how to hang a light fixture and literally you have to put the thing together piece by piece. Luckily, this isn't the first fixture that I have hung, however if it was there was no way I would have been able how to figure out how to put it together and hang it with zero instructions. Once you do spend several hours putting it together and hanging it, it is a nice fixture. My local hardware store had some nice LED E12 bulbs for it that fit nicely and really lit up the room.
customer_reviews.author: Nute

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this chandelier for my daughters room and we love it. It’s just enough bling for my teenagers ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chandelier for my daughters room and we love it. It’s just enough bling for my teenagers room. The sculptured piece on the ceiling I added, when my builder cut the hole in the ceiling it matching perfectly to the piece that mounts on the ceiling (it would would have rocked back and forth if I didn’t add that piece). I actually love that it adds an additional pop to the chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this item on March 20, unfortunately I ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item on March 20, unfortunately I just tried putting it up this past week. The light did not have the internal wiring inside of it so when my contractor hung the light it fell after about 3 min. Of course when it fell some of the crystals shattered and the bottom arms of the light got damaged. Extremely dissappointed since the return window closed on April 19.
customer_reviews.author: Niktaha

customer_reviews.title: Pretty chandelier but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty chandelier but it's not all glass. The top crystals are cheap plastic. It came rusted on the side and cheaply made. The only glass part is the hanging crystals. It looks good hanging up though.
customer_reviews.author: Natalya

customer_reviews.title: Love my light
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my light. My dad helped me put it up... they were right about no directions but we manage! And it looks great... I didn't know about getting lights, I thought it needed something different cause it looked weird but i got led lights
customer_reviews.author: dawn seymour

customer_reviews.title: If you are an impatient person... pretend you never saw this and move on.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty once installed. Casts a lot of light. Brightens the space. Fragile, thin and flimsy parts. Three stars due to poor design on an installation level/wiring. You really need to know what you are doing or you can easily make a mistake. Beyond frustrating and time consuming to install. We are experienced with home improvement projects and this is a serious pain. Zero exaggeration. Total aggravating install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic  shade crystals
customer_reviews.text: Looks great up, but definitely need electrician. All wires within light need to be wired. Biggest disappointment is the cheap plastic for crystals. They are held on what feels like silver bread ties. The crystals dangling down are beautiful glass.
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: This product is great..
customer_reviews.text: This product is great.... I ordered this product and i got it delivered to my address really fast. As expected, the steps to assemble this is not clearly explained. But it pretty easy to assemble this product. Always start assembling the product from the bottom to top, else you have little difficulty. But altogether the product is really great and it looks awesome. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chandelier
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier will make a huge difference in any room. It is absolutely beautiful. The only negative was the the lack of instructions, but if you can install a ceiling fan, you should be able to install this. We ordered another chandelier from Lamps Plus, and crystals look identical. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JSicairosAZMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a romantic, Parisian feel
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely stunning and especially for the price! I had it installed in my bedroom for a romantic, Parisian feel and this chandelier is perfect! It's certainly a statement piece and looks much more expensive than it is. I had it installed only 5 rungs from the ceiling, as I have standard sized ceilings, and it looks incredible. Not only have I received compliments from all of my guests, but it was a simple way to glam up my bedroom while on a budget. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Add some Wow to your room
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chandelier. Don’t know if it’s easy to put together or install my electrician did this. But absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Chandelier looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier completes the look we were looking for. It looks great and the price is nice too. Seems well built and it should last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Morales

customer_reviews.title: Sexy bedroom light
customer_reviews.text: Great light fixture! Was cheap and SUPER easy to install. Just watch the video on YouTube for instructions since they weren't really provided.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous! Stunningly Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: i love, love, love this fixture! You can see it the minute you walk in the front door! It is breathtakingly beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Foster Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: If you leave off the dangly crystals, it’s beautiful and looks more expensive than its cost.
customer_reviews.author: LaToya

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful light fixture
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful light fixture. Absolutely stunning! I ordered 2 and they were packaged perfectly with no damage or missing parts. My husband has lots of experience installing lighting so it was no trouble.
customer_reviews.author: JOE CAISSE

customer_reviews.title: ... spot and the third time's the charm I absolutely love it it looks like it cost $1
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Chandelier in the spot and the third time's the charm I absolutely love it it looks like it cost $1,000 high quality and a great value I'm very picky and it is absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.author: sherry keefe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful chandelier. Brightens up the dining room. Easy to assemble. E12 bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Paid for box of parts, no instructions.
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier was the hardest thing to put together. All pieces had to be put together, even the main wires from the individual lights needed to be the gathered together. Not one part of the installation was easy. The electrical installation was one of the most confusing installations I ever had to put together. The instructions were a joke. after getting this item, I understand why it was so inexpensive, you basically had to build the damned thing yourself. It's pretty but do yourself a favor and spring for one that is already put together. Your time is too precious for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More beautiful than the picture conveys
customer_reviews.text: More beautiful than the picture conveys. Love this chandelier soooooo much and have had a ton of compliments. More than I expected for the price. FYI, have a working knowledge of electrical or a professional as it comes in pieces.
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely breathtaking
customer_reviews.text: This crystal chandelier is in my daughters bedroom she picked it out herself. She has the lightest blue walls with white trim and the chandelier illuminates onto the ceiling at night it is absolutely breathtaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!!! Even better than the photo! One of my all time favorite purchases. Fyi, It took 20 minutes to assemble and light bulbs were not included.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes you work for the beauty!
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty once assembled and set up. It took 5 hours to put together. The instructions requires a magnifying glass to see all the parts and directions... or the lack of instructions made it a bit challenging for first lighting install. Key things I've learned, the legs (chandeliers) with wires do not stay connected with when you screw the middle piece on. This was 4 disassembles before we found that if you unscrew the bottom where the ball hangs, you can screw it on easier. Moral, every piece that is screwed on needs to be disassembled to reassemble. Did require a call for help to get the wires to stay. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Sandita

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The chanderlier is elegant and looks very good at our dinning room the only problem was we had no assembly instructions. Call an electrician to install who will charge around $100!!
customer_reviews.author: C Lite

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but lots of pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty. Felt sorry for my electrician as each arm of the light had to be wired together as they were each separate. I have never seen a light like this.
customer_reviews.author: RCW1

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, Love it! I added an extra long chain because of high ceiling. Then covered the chain with fabric! Love how it looks in my living room!
customer_reviews.author: Charles M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This light is absolutely beautiful for the price. It does come needed quite some assembly but for the price, you can't beat it! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: S. O’Brien

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chandelier, I have on my bedroom and I always have compliments on how good and charming it looks over my queen bed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea V

customer_reviews.title: Missing crystals
customer_reviews.text: We are missing two of the acrylic crystals from the lamp shade. How can we get these? Paula isenhower
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This chandelier is so beautiful and very fashion
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is so beautiful and very fashion. the only thing I don't like is the crystals that are around are plastic and they lose shine like really quick
customer_reviews.author: alejandra frias

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entry way light fixture!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I needed some bling in my life and this delivered. Could use better directions on putting it together, but very happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: j napier

customer_reviews.title: looks beautiful and expensive
customer_reviews.text: As with the majority of the reviews, the instructions are extremely limited. However, the product once put together by my cousin, looks beautiful and expensive! I absolutely love it. I do recommend wearing gloves while you assemble it so you don't get finger prints on the crystals. It was packaged nicely. It looks lovely in my kitchen book.
customer_reviews.author: MSwindell

customer_reviews.title: I took a risk on buying something like this online but I am so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I took a risk on buying something like this online but I am so glad I did, the quality is great and makes my room more grown and sexy.Set up is easy and fast. I've had tons of compliments with my room setup saying its pinterest worthy. Thank you for such a great product! Would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks terrific in the room
customer_reviews.text: looks terrific in the room. Looks more expensive than it really was. Gives off plenty of light. Fairly easy to hang as far as lights go, did have to adjust the bulb holders a bit but all good. Instructions are weak, but its fairly simple to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: neil o

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome and with daylight bulbs, sparkles wonderfully. It isn't the highest quality but great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: xoxoxo

customer_reviews.title: Omg perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect!! Even my husband was amazed!! Just buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Cholly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wall reflections!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I bought reveal bulbs and it's so pretty. The rods may be bent or I need to try to adjust the chandelier as it appears to tip unevenly.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm completely in love. Easy to ensemble. Same as picture. More beautiful that I was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is so pretty and looks very very beautiful when you finish installing ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so pretty and looks very very beautiful when you finish installing it. Got may compliments in my new housewarming.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Looked cheap when I took it out of the box. Immediately packed it up and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: RealtorBrett

customer_reviews.title: Super annoying to assemble and install
customer_reviews.text: Super annoying to assemble and install, but the finished product is beautiful! I'm glad we pushed through installing, because halfway through I was ready to box it up and send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful fixture. Easily installed and well-packaged. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: KABO

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks a lot fancier than what I paid for it. Wish the chain was a bit longer though.
customer_reviews.author: Teanna

customer_reviews.title: No installation instructions
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fixture but a pain to assesmble with no instructions. Hard to find instructions online
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I can't even tell you how much I LOVE this chandelier in my bedroom! It was the perfect touch of sparkle needed. All my friends and family who have come to visit rave about how great it looks and one of the things they remember about my house. Great size, quality and easy to assemble! Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! It's exactly what I wanted! Placed it in my dining room.
customer_reviews.author: ddyzgrl

customer_reviews.title: Chic living spaces
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. In my living room. My husband cut the cord when installing it because we needed it to be closer to the ceiling. I'm very pleased with the purchase. Have receive several compliments and only been up one day.
customer_reviews.author: ateire lombard

customer_reviews.title: Nice light but they really should have included detailed instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice light but they really should have included detailed instructions instead of one picture. Cheaply made, but looks good once it's up
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Pure Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning...stunning...and even more stunning!!! I have a small salon studio and this just added that elegance I was craving! A++++++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Took my father in law some time to put up but I LOVE IT ! Beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Hiram Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Sparled
customer_reviews.text: The light is perfect in the master bedroom. It really sparkles. The builders electrician put it up so I can't comment on ease /difficulty of installation.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Pappert

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. You have to be an the electrician to put this together, I'm not.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thus is a gorgeous chandelier. Exactly as shown in picture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We bought 2 lights. No instructions except for placing ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 lights. No instructions except for placing crystals. The round bottom crystals on both lights did not fit the lights. So it could not be put together as pictured in photo. No wiring guide which would have help as the light has to be disassembled to wire. Not for the average customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to put together but beautiful! Looks great over my dining table!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still very nice looking but plastic mounting hardware diminishes the quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks more expensive in pictures than it does in person. Still very nice looking but plastic mounting hardware diminishes the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this chandelier. It brightens up our dining room. We've also received lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light fixture! I get a ton of compliments on this piece. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It s not as big as I expected, but still nice
customer_reviews.author: SSS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. A little difficult to hang, the instructions are not for an ameture.
customer_reviews.author: Mioshia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful- worth the penny
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. It is worth 5 stars but had to give 4 stars due to lack of installation instructions.
customer_reviews.author: KiranL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Chandelier and great price. Looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: hilary casanova

customer_reviews.title: Very easy for an electrician to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy for an electrician to install. If you attempt to install yourself it will take hours. The picture on Amazon looks better than the actual light. The chandelier itself could have better finishes but looks very pretty once up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking chandelier and looks extremely well in our bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Great looking chandelier and looks extremely well in our bedroom. We already received serveral very nice compliments.. I rated it 4 starts only because of the enormous amount of time it took to put together and hang. The instructions were worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Parra

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chandelier, but no installation instructions included
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful chandelier, but how it could be shipped without installation instructions or clear assembly schematics? What was included - safety instructions with a very poorly printed assembly drawing, barely can make out what is actually shown. This statement by the seller " We send you detailed installation instructions in your package, it is easy to install, make money saving without hiring professional worker" is not correct. Again, the product is really nice, but the lack of instructions is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: NY customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The light is pretty but there were no instructions and it needs to be assembled and wired.
customer_reviews.author: KCam

customer_reviews.title: Simply Gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks gorgeous in our dinning room! We also purchased cylinder style matching lights for the hallway and foyer. All look beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: LoveLaw

customer_reviews.title: Love it. However limitedinstructions with it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. However limitedinstructions with it! Took awhile to figure it out. Also takes special bulbs that are not included. I live out in the country so will be looking for them online.
customer_reviews.author: tonja t cates

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our house , Beautiful, I have extra bright LED bulbs in it . Beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price it can't be beat!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough how much I love this light. It really glams up my dining room. I have a huge window in my dining room and when the light hits the chandelier it makes the whole room look amazing. Assembly is a bit tedious, but honestly it's so worth it. My husband and I were able to install the light with no issue. I did pair it with a ceiling medallion as the base is rather small and I felt like it needed a little something extra.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey lockwood

customer_reviews.title: This is poor quality, cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is poor quality, cheap!! Looks better than it is! I guess you get what you pay for, my bad!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wohlhueter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The perfect compliment to my dining room. Just lovely!! Many than you's.
customer_reviews.author: MosleyT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this chandelier. It puts off beautiful shadows. Had to put together but it was not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna DeLawter

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is ok, but is smaller than I was thinking.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Heidy Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed of the product received for the price. I can't wait to install it!!!
customer_reviews.author: lachbunch

customer_reviews.title: A lot of work to put it together.
customer_reviews.text: It takes a lot of time to put it together, way to much but most important this is the cheapest light I ever had. Every single piece is cheap as it can get, you have to be very careful. I'm the kinda guy that's is looking for high quality products that's why I don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Buy this light..now!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these in the past year. One for my old house, one for my new house and the last as a gift for somebody who liked mine. I have probably convinced at least three other people too order them after seeing mine!!! It is gorgeous and looks like it costs 10x more than the price. Get it..you won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Laureen Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look just as in picture. assembly is a little demanding
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Jason Philips

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this light for our dining room and absolutely love it! It is stunning!! We also purchased the matching hallway light and semi flush mount for our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sparkly and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Very sparkly! I like it a lot....could double as a disco ball in a pinch (which I am ok with). Does leave fun shadow patterns on the wall. Materials are a little flimsy (the metal part)...not sure how easy it will be to clean/dust...time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie Bush

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing I looks as same in the picture I love it.
customer_reviews.author: johanna ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Terrible stuff. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Terrible stuff. DO NOT BUY....very cheap quality. Looks like a $30 quality with no instructions and very poor engineering to put it together. I returned it the next day. Went to a big box hardware store and purchased a high end looking piece for a few bucks more.
customer_reviews.author: Audio101

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chandelier, looks elegant and awesome
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chandelier , looks elegant and awesome . Very easy to instal and assembling the crystals .
customer_reviews.author: Soms

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but lacking directions
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but several F bombs dropped during installation. There are no instructions other than where to hang the crystals.
customer_reviews.author: Akaz

customer_reviews.title: It really is beautiful though!
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is GORGEOUS! I have a large mirror in the room so you can see in reflection from the living room. I gave 4 stars because the long cylinder that goes down the middle was too short and the wire covers were too small. A simple project turned into a much longer day hanging this, I didn't contact the company because everything was out and ready to go, I didn't want to have to send back and all that mess. It really is beautiful though!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: Although the light itself is nice, the installation instructions were basically nonexistant. This made putting the fixture together frustrating and unnecesssarily time consuming. It was so bad that I would have returned it, if I hadn't already taken everything out of the box and started to put it together. For the price, the least the manufacterer could have done was to include proper installation instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Looking
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture is plastic & cheap looking. I ordered it full of excitement. Once I opened the box I realized nothing was real (at least done fixtures have real chrome). Everything was plastic! I didn't want to hang it. It came together in one piece so not sure why people said they have to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: LaTashia

product_meta.title: LightInTheBox Modern Chandeliers with 4 Lights Pendant Light with Crystal Drops in Round, Ceiling Light Fixture for Dining Room, Bedroom, Living Room
feature_bullets: We are persistent with original design by our professional designers
Every product is deliberately composed of dozens of procedures and presented by hundreds of brilliant craftsmen
We hold a very strict quality control system to check every connector of our products for your safety
Our packaging is tested to withstand high pressure and force of more than 50kg. It offers complete protection on all sides to guarantee your items will arrive in perfect condition
Installation instructions are included in your package, it is easy to install.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars235 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
